title: Single chokepoint gate ordering
implementation_summary: build_order_intent() is the single chokepoint for all dispatch. Enforces deterministic gate ordering (1-8): DispatchAuth, Preflight, Quantize, FeeCacheCheck, LiquidityGate, NetEdgeGate, Pricer, RecordedBeforeDispatch. OPEN intents require all 8 gates. CLOSE/HEDGE skip gates 5-7. CANCEL-only exits after DispatchAuth. RiskState != Healthy blocks OPEN at gate 1.
